metadata.title: CVE-2022-48424 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 6.1.3, fs/ntfs3/inode.c does not validate theattribute name offset. An unhandled page fault may occur.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
